definitions: Strike or put down (something) forcefully and noisily.
Cause (something) to strike something else unexpectedly and sharply.
(of a sports player) hit (a ball or a shot) forcefully and successfully.
Make a sudden loud noise, typically repeatedly.
(with reference to something such as a door) open or close noisily.
(of a person) move around or do something noisily.
(typically used of a man) have sexual intercourse with.
